Uses of Class
pulse.search.math.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    pulse.search.direction
    Provides a list of PathSolvers and associated classes, which are used to determine the direction of the minimum of a specific SearchTask using an iterative approach.
    pulse.search.math
    Provides general math functionality that is used when finding the direction (a Vector) of the minimum, including operations with vector and matrices.

      Methods in pulse.search.math that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Matrix Matrix.adjugate()
      Constructs an adjugate Matrix, the elements of which are aij=Aji, where Aij are the cofactors of this Matrix
      Matrix Matrix.inverse()
      Inverts the n-by-n Matrix using an adjugate matrix and the determinant of this matrix.
      Matrix Matrix.multiply​(double f)
      Scales this Matrix by f, which results in element-wise multiplication by f.

      Performs Matrix multiplication.
      static Matrix Matrix.outerProduct​(Vector a, Vector b)
      Calculates the outer product of two vectors, which is represented as a * bT

      Calculates a submatrix by eliminating the row and column from this Matrix
